user_prompt: Create Epics and User Stories for the usecase

epics.title: User Authentication and Multi-Factor Login
epics.summary: Implement secure and compliant multi-factor authentication for portal access.
epics.description: Develop a secure authentication module enabling customers to log in using multi-factor authentication. Integrate with existing identity management and security frameworks of the bank. The login process should include password verification, one-time passcodes, and optional biometric methods. Ensure the module is compliant with regulatory standards for banking security and privacy, and capable of handling future enhancements like adaptive authentication.

epics.title: Personalized User Dashboard
epics.summary: Design a dashboard that presents personalized banking information based on user profile.
epics.description: Create a dynamic user dashboard that displays relevant banking products, account summaries, and services tailored to the individual’s profile and eligibility. This dashboard should have an intuitive user interface, quick navigation panels, and visual indicators for pending actions or messages. It should prioritize personalization and responsiveness for different device types, providing customers with easy access to operations such as view account details, initiate transactions, and manage service requests.

epics.title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
epics.summary: Enable customers to initiate and manage account opening and service modification requests.
epics.description: Develop guided workflows to facilitate new account creation, account upgrades, and service modification requests with minimal clicks. Each workflow should validate user input, manage document uploads, and track progress in real time. Integrate with the bank’s internal systems for automatic routing to approval teams, ensuring seamless back-office coordination and compliance with internal service-level agreements.

epics.title: Real-Time Status Updates and Notifications
epics.summary: Provide customers with real-time updates and notification services.
epics.description: Implement a real-time status tracking system that provides instant visibility into the progress of submitted requests. Integrate event-driven notifications to alert users via email and portal messages whenever their transactions or service requests reach critical milestones. Ensure all updates are synchronized with the workflow engine and core banking services for accuracy and timeliness.

epics.title: Interaction History and Activity Logs
epics.summary: Record and display a full history of all user interactions and requests.
epics.description: Develop a module to capture and maintain an auditable history of user activities such as request submissions, document uploads, and communications. Provide an accessible timeline view within the customer’s portal where they can review past actions. Partner this functionality with administrative logs to support compliance auditing and operational insights.

epics.title: Document Upload and Secure Storage
epics.summary: Enable customers to upload and securely store documents within the portal.
epics.description: Build a secure document management system that allows users to upload identity verification and support documents for account and service requests. Establish encryption for storage and transfer, ensuring all regulatory data privacy requirements are met. The system should validate document types, manage metadata, and integrate securely with core banking document repositories.

epics.title: Save and Resume Application Functionality
epics.summary: Allow users to save incomplete applications and continue later.
epics.description: Implement a persistence mechanism that enables users to save progress during application and service request workflows. Allow drafts to be loaded and continued smoothly at a later time or on another device. Provide visual indicators showing saved states, last modified date, and required steps to complete applications to support flexible yet efficient interactions.

epics.title: Responsive and Accessible User Interface
epics.summary: Create a responsive portal optimized for desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
epics.description: Design the portal with responsive front-end design using modern frameworks to provide a consistent user experience across devices and browsers. Ensure accessibility standards such as WCAG compliance are met. Implement mobile-first design principles that optimize performance and readability while allowing quick and easy navigation of essential banking functions.

epics.title: Integration with Core Banking System and Database
epics.summary: Integrate the self-service portal with core banking systems and a dedicated database layer.
epics.description: Establish reliable API connections between the self-service portal and the bank’s core banking infrastructure. Implement a dedicated portal database to handle customer sessions, request statuses, and cached data to improve performance. Manage integration through secure API gateways and middleware for efficient and fault-tolerant communication with existing systems.

epics.title: Role-Based Access Control
epics.summary: Implement role-based access and permission management for the portal.
epics.description: Design and configure role-based access control that defines permissions for different user categories such as customers, employees, and administrators. Ensure that customers only see services relevant to their role and authorization level. Provide tools to manage user roles dynamically as business rules change, maintaining a secure environment that prevents data exposure across roles.

epics.title: Data Protection and Portal Security
epics.summary: Establish a comprehensive data security and protection framework.
epics.description: Incorporate layers of security into the system architecture including encryption, intrusion detection, and continuous vulnerability assessment. Protect sensitive financial data through encryption in transit and at rest, secure session handling, and implementation of role-based authentication checks. Regularly audit the system for adherence to data privacy regulations and security standards.

epics.title: Performance Optimization and Reliability
epics.summary: Optimize system performance to ensure scalability and reliability.
epics.description: Develop a performance tuning strategy for achieving high availability and scalability under increased load. Implement load balancing, caching strategies, and health monitoring for critical modules. Continuously analyze key performance metrics and tune database and API interactions to ensure the portal remains responsive and available to users at all times.

user_stories.title: Implement secure multi-factor authentication
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to log in using a secure multi-factor authentication, so that my portal access is secure.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement password verification, one-time passcodes, and optional biometric methods.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to log in using password and additional factors such as one-time passcodes or biometric methods.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with valid credentials, when they attempt to log in, then the system should prompt for additional authentication factors.

user_stories.title: Create a dynamic user dashboard
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to see personalized banking information on my dashboard, so that I can easily manage my accounts and services.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Dashboard should display relevant banking products, account summaries, and services tailored to the user. It should have an intuitive user interface, and quick navigation panels.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Dashboard should display personalized information based on user profile and preferences.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user with specific profile and preferences, when they log in, then the dashboard should display personalized information relevant to them.

user_stories.epic_title: Account Opening and Service Modification Workflows
user_stories.title: Develop guided workflows for account and service requests
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to initiate and manage account opening or service modification requests, so that I can efficiently handle my banking needs.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Workflows should validate user input, manage document uploads, and track progress in real time. Integrate with internal systems for approval routing.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to submit account and service requests with validated inputs and track the progress.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user submitting a request, when they provide necessary inputs and documents, then the system should validate and track the progress.

user_stories.title: Implement real-time status tracking and notifications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want real-time updates on my requests, so that I am informed about the status of my transactions or service requests.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Integrate event-driven notifications to alert users via email and portal messages.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should receive real-time notifications on critical milestones in their requests.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a submitted request, when it reaches a critical milestone, then the user should receive a notification.

user_stories.title: Record and display user interaction history
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to review my past actions in the portal, so that I can track my interaction history.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Capture and maintain an auditable history of user activities. Provide an accessible timeline view within the portal.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to view a timeline of their past actions.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a series of user actions, when the user views their interaction history, then they should see an accurate timeline of those actions.

user_stories.title: Enable secure document upload and storage
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to securely upload and store documents, so that my sensitive information is protected.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Establish encryption for storage and transfer. Validate document types and manage metadata securely.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to upload and store documents securely, with regulatory compliance.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a document to upload, when the user submits it, then it should be validated and stored securely with encryption.

user_stories.title: Allow saving and resuming of applications
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want to save incomplete applications, so that I can continue them later.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Enable saving progress during workflows. Provide visual indicators for saved states.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Users should be able to save their progress and resume applications from saved states.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an incomplete application, when the user saves it, then they should be able to resume from the saved state later.

user_stories.title: Create a responsive and accessible portal interface
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want a responsive user interface, so that I can access the portal seamlessly across different devices.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Design with responsive front-end design using modern frameworks. Ensure WCAG compliance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should be responsive and accessible across desktop, tablet, and mobile devices.
user_stories.test_cases: Given different devices, when the user accesses the portal, then it should display consistently and be accessible.

user_stories.epic_title: Integration with Core Banking System and Database
user_stories.title: Establish reliable API connections with core systems
user_stories.description: As a customer, I want seamless integration with core banking systems, so that my transactions and data are accurately processed.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement API connections. Manage integration through secure API gateways and middleware for efficient communication.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should reliably communicate with core banking systems.
user_stories.test_cases: Given an API request, when the portal communicates with core banking systems, then the communication should be secure and reliable.

user_stories.title: Implement role-based access and permissions
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to manage permissions based on user roles, so that we can ensure data security and compliance.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Define permissions for different user categories. Provide tools to manage user roles dynamically.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Permissions should be managed based on user roles, preventing unauthorized access.
user_stories.test_cases: Given a user role, when accessing the portal, then the user should only see services relevant to their role.

user_stories.title: Establish comprehensive data security and protection
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to secure portal data, so that user information is protected from breaches and unauthorized access.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement encryption, intrusion detection, and vulnerability assessment. Regularly audit the system for data privacy compliance.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: Sensitive data should be protected through robust security measures.
user_stories.test_cases: Given user data, when it is stored or transmitted, then it should be encrypted and handled securely.

user_stories.title: Optimize system performance for scalability and reliability
user_stories.description: As an administrator, I want to ensure high availability and performance of the portal, so that users have a responsive experience.
user_stories.attributes_and_rules: Implement performance tuning, load balancing, and health monitoring. Continuously analyze key performance metrics.
user_stories.acceptance_criteria: The portal should maintain high performance and reliability under increased load.
user_stories.test_cases: Given increased load, when users access the portal, then it should remain responsive and available without performance degradation.

architecture_generation.description: Architecture designed for a self-service banking portal utilizing Azure services for security, performance, and a seamless user experience across devices.

architecture_validation.updatedDescription: The architecture has been enhanced to address critical security and reliability issues by introducing Azure Web Application Firewall (WAF) and implementing a multi-region disaster recovery plan for databases. Operational excellence, performance efficiency, and cost optimization recommendations have been noted for future improvements. The updated architecture ensures a more secure, reliable, and scalable self-service banking portal.
